name: Lonely Space Trucking
description:
Pilot your space truck, complete with fragile cab and indestructible trailer, as you attempt to fend off ramming drones  from the gas station.

You're only one trucker, and you probably wont survive, but maybe you can help the next person's odds a little bit.

Made for the GMTK 2019 Jam, and to knock the rust off of my Unity skills. I think that it stands as a prototype, and I like it, so I intend to keep working on it after the jam. I'll upload jam versions for posterity when I do.
